# Shaman King: Marcos

volume cover
| ja_kanji        = SHAMAN KING マルコス
| ja_romaji       = Shāman Kingu Marukosu
| genre           = |Supernatural}}
| creator = Hiroyuki Takei
}}
| imprint      = Magazine Edge KC
| magazine     = Shōnen Magazine Edge
| first        = April 17, 2020
| last         = June 17, 2022
| volumes      = 5
| volume_list  =
}}
is a Japanese manga series by Jet Kusamura. It is a spin-off of the original Shaman King manga by Hiroyuki Takei. It was serialized in Kodansha's Shōnen Magazine Edge from April 2020 to June 2022, with its chapters collected in five  volumes.
Publication
Shaman King: Marcos, written by Hiroyuki Takei and illustrated by Jet Kusamura, was serialized in Kodansha's Shōnen Magazine Edge from April 17, 2020, to June 17, 2022. Kodansha has collected its chapters into five  volumes, released from August 17, 2020, and the last on August 17, 2022.
In January 2021, Kodansha USA announced that they have licensed the series for English digital release, with the first volume made available on March 9, 2021, and the last on April 18, 2023.
